data.name: Match Village
data.detailed_description:
Support the developer:


https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807930/Railway_Islands__Puzzle/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1997070/HEN_CHICKS_AND_CATS/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592880/Sokocat__Islands/


About the Game

Match Village is a minimalist strategy experience about matching buildings to build villages on colorful islands. Match buildings to create your villages and cities on endless islands around the world and enjoy the minimalistic and relaxing atmosphere, no resource management or armies, focus only on building.

Hey, before you add it to your wish list, know that this is an indie game, developed by a guy in his room. Don't expect a AAA experience with hours of content in this game.

What this game has to offer:

  • Different and intuitive gameplay.
  • Randomly generated islands.
  • A minimalist and relaxing atmosphere.
  • Just build, don't worry about armies or resource management.
  • Great to play once in a while, discover new islands, buildings and beat your high score.

What this game does NOT have to offer:

  • Battles
  • Armies and ships
  • Resource management
  • Planes, Cars and other vehicles.
  • lightsabers
  • Spaceships

How is the game?

You must make match 3 buildings of the same type to create a completely new one and earn cards and building points to advance to the next island, combine three huts to create a house for example. But here you don't choose what you're going to build, the cards are given by the game and you must think well where to place it to make the match three, earn points and new cards in your inventory. The game ends when there are no more cards in the inventory and you don't have enough points to advance to the next islands (Gameover), you will have to restart the game.

This game is inspired by amazing games like:

  • Islanders
  • Candy Crush Saga

The game is still under development with a release date of 2022, you can support this project by purchasing some of my games on Steam.
